⚡ Projects

This project involved building a custom Intrusion Detection System (IDS) using Snort and Python automation. The system continuously monitored network traffic and triggered alerts on suspicious activity.

A secondary Python script automated the log parsing process and fed data into a dashboard for real-time analysis. The system successfully detected test attacks, such as port scans and brute force attempts.

I designed and implemented a web-based vulnerability management tool to streamline CVE tracking and patch workflows.

The platform integrated with security advisories, automatically mapped CVEs to installed software, and provided actionable remediation steps for system administrators.
